metadata.title: CVE-2023-46343 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel before 6.5.9, there is a NULL pointer dereference insend_acknowledge in net/nfc/nci/spi.c.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
